5. "limbic" - This is another specific area of the brain that is mentioned in the paragraph. "Limbic" refers to the limbic system, which is a group of structures in the brain that play a role in emotion, motivation, and memory.
6. "paralimbic" - This term is a combination of "para" meaning "beside" and "limbic", referring to areas of the brain that are located near the limbic system.
7. "cortices" - This is a plural noun that refers to the outer layers of the brain, specifically the cerebral cortex.
8. "abusers" - This term refers to individuals who use drugs, specifically "MA" (which is likely to stand for "methamphetamine").
